actions.query:
CREATE TABLE "users-progress" (
	"id"	TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"time"	INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coins"	INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"level"	INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"xp"	INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"xp-goal"	INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 300,
	"joinvoice"	TEXT DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY("id")
);
actions.name: Run SQL Query MOD
Run SQL Query MOD

actions.query:
CREATE TABLE "users-attachments" (
	"id"	TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"username"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown',
	"skin"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'MHF_Steve',
	"skin-posture"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default',
	"pet"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'null',
	"background"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'null',
	"description"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Sem descriÃ§Ã£o.',
	"color-role"	TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'null',
	PRIMARY KEY("id")
);
actions.name: Run SQL Query MOD
